thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Community Health Systems Announces Definitive Agreements To Sell Leesville, Louisiana Hospital To Allegiance Health Management

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Community Health Systems Announces Definitive Agreements To Sell Leesville, Louisiana Hospital To Allegiance Health Management

organizations.name: louisiana hospital to allegiance health management

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Community Health Systems Inc:
* COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES DEFINITIVE AGREEMENTS TO SELL LEESVILLE, LOUISIANA HOSPITAL TO ALLEGIANCE HEALTH MANAGEMENT
* COMMUNITY HEALTH SYSTEMS - HOSPITAL INCLUDED IN THE DEAL IS ONE OF ADDITIONAL PLANNED DIVESTITURES DISCUSSED ON Q3 EARNINGS CALL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
